animeTitle: The Best Medical God in the City
otherNames: The Divine Urban Physician, Dios Urbano de la Medicina, Divine Urban God, I Whose Clan Was Destroyed Came Back With the Strongest Power, Pour venger mon clan, The Best Medical God in the City, Urban God of Medicine, 一族を滅ぼされた俺が最強の力を手に入れて帰ってきた, 都市极品医神
synopsis: Five years ago, the Ye Family was exterminated, and Ye Chen, the loser of the Ye family, was missing. Five Years later, Ye Chen came back with amazing and powerful cultivation power! This time, he would make the heaven tremble with awe and the earth quiver with fear! He would control everything and be the top of the world!
